title: Open Relationship's Do's and Dont's
itunes:title: Open Relationship's Do's and Dont's
description:
Today on the show we ran back the interview Angela Yee had with August Alsina that has everyone talking, especially the part of him revealing his relationship with Jada Pinkett Smith that her husband Will Smith approved. In fact, we even had people call in and ask them if they were to do an open relationship and what would be the proper protocol to tell your partner? Also we had callers call up to give their nomination for "Donkey of the Day"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we ran back the interview Angela Yee had with August Alsina that has everyone talking, especially the part of him revealing his relationship with Jada Pinkett Smith that her husband Will Smith approved. In fact, we even had people call in and ask them if they were to do an open relationship and what would be the proper protocol to tell your partner? Also we had callers call up to give their nomination for "Donkey of the Day"
